movie_title: Did Taylor Swift fans cause an earthquake? ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: Did Taylor Swift fans cause an earthquake? For audio and transcript downloads, plus a quiz and a lis

vocabulary.definition: relating to or caused by an earthquake
vocabulary.example: The seismic activity from Taylor Swift's concert was detected miles away.

vocabulary.definition: simultaneous performance or utterance of action
vocabulary.example: The fans jumped up and down in unison to Taylor Swift's music.
The ground flexed as thousands of fans danced at the concert.

vocabulary.definition: a class or category of quality or excellence
vocabulary.example: The energy from the concert was not in the same league as a real earthquake.

vocabulary.definition: similar in size, amount, or quality
vocabulary.example: The seismologists tried to make the concert energy output comparable to an earthquake.

vocabulary.definition: relating to the structure of the earth's crust and the large-scale processes that take place within it
vocabulary.example: An earthquake is caused by the movement of tectonic plates.
